data.text: Kata kamano, joma ne nigi chandruok ok nochak obed gikuyo kendo. E ndalo mosekadho Nyasaye nomiyo piny Zebulun gi piny Naftali odoko pinje michayo, to e ndalo mabiro Jehova Nyasaye notingʼ malo Galili mar ogendini man yo nam modak e tiend aora Jordan:
Joma wuotho e mudho
Isemiyo piny oyarore
Mana kaka e kinde mane olo jo-Midian e lweny,
Wuoch duto mag lweny
Nimar osenywolnwa nyathi,
Lochne gi kwe mare nobed
Jehova Nyasaye oseoro wach ni okecho gi joka Jakobo,
Ji duto biro winjo wachno
“Ute mag matafare osepodho,
To Jehova Nyasaye biro miyo wasik Rezin teko mondo oked kodgi,
Jo-Aram mane oa yo wuok chiengʼ kod jo-Filistia mane oa yo podho chiengʼ;
Kata obedo ni osekumogi kamano to ji pok odwogo ire
Omiyo Jehova Nyasaye biro ngʼado joma ogen kod ji ajia mag Israel,
jodongo kod joma ogen e wich jo-Israel,
Jotend ogandani osemiyo gilal
Kuom mano Ruoth Nyasaye ok nobed mamor gi jomatindo
Adier timbe mamono chalo gi mach maliel;
Mirimb Jehova Nyasaye Maratego
E bathe korachwich gibiro mecho
Manase biro chamo Efraim kendo Efraim nocham Manase;
